title: Macosx upgrade faliure : Unable to access QConsole on Upgrade form 4.2-9.2 to 5.0 Nightly
description:
Upgrade Path : From 4.2-9.2 to 5.0 Nightly

Build Used:
    Base Build   : MarkLogic-4.2-9.2-x86_64.dmg
    Nightly Build : MarkLogic-5.0-20130208-x86_64.dmg


Steps to reproduce:

1. Install base build : MarkLogic-4.2-9.2-x86_64.dmg .
2. Upgrade to 5.0-Nightly.
3. After Upgrade , access the QConsole ; link : http://localhost:8000/qconsole/
 
Expected Output : QConsole home page should be displayed.
Actual Output : Broken QConsole home page with error : Page Not Found.

Please find attached 
1. Error Snippet : "4292-505UpgradeBug" while accessing qconsole.
2. Error Log : "ErrorLog_20130207_4292-505"

changeHistory.comment:
NOTE : Above scenario working fine on below mentioned Upgrade path
           1. Macosx : 5.0-4.1 to 5.0 Nightly
           2. Win 7    : 4.2-9.2 to 5.0 Nightly
I also want to add that this worked until 01/22 and appears to be a new issue.

I tried this on my mac machine and upgrade went through fine and qconsole comes up. 

I did the following before upgrade (to uninstall 4.2.9 version) - 

 rm -rf ~/Library/MarkLogic
   rm -rf ~/Library/PreferencePanes/MarkLogic.prefPane
   rm -rf ~/Library/StartupItems/MarkLogic

and left he Data dire alone
Aries I am giving this to you. As discussed can you see if you can reproduce this and annotate the bug with your findings

I can't reproduce the issue

Upgrading from 4.2-9.2 - 5.0-nightly (02/08) doesn't produce any problem in opening qconsole (using Firefox and Safari browsers). I can run scripts on qconsole too

Mayank, I tried this as well and could not reproduce it. 

Can you verify it once more and CLOSE this bug if you cannot reproduce it anymore. Here are the steps we followed to reproduce the issue:

1. DO a clean installation of ML 4.2-9.2
Clean installation  means that you delete all of the following before installation:

~/Library/MarkLogic
~/Library/Application Support/MarkLogic
~/Library/StartupItems/MarkLogic
~/Library/PreferencePanes/MarkLogic.prefPane

2. Then start the server and add following license information and complete the license acceptance
Licensee:  MarkLogic - Version 5 QA Test License
Key: B685-CEC6-75BB-9DB9-B95C-E267-2BB9-D10F-2873-C31E-91FE-878C-BADD-DEC6-78B3-ED5F-EE77-EBBD-D11F-277A-BB2E-FAC5-3200

3. Then stop the server and install 5.0 nightly on top of it. You do not need to delete any folder before upgrade (As per documentation)

4. Start the server , accept license and then go to QConsole

Everything works fine.
I tried to produce the bug with above mentioned steps but was not able to, seems like there there must some environment issue on the machine that day.
